keyMoments.title: Happa Yamao Helps Usopp
keyMoments.description: Happa Yamao, a former bandit turned carpenter, shows kindness to Usopp by giving him rice balls and accepting his tools as payment for wood and supplies when Usopp has limited funds.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the theme of unexpected kindness during the crew's darkest hour in Water 7.

relationships.description: Happa showed kindness to Usopp by providing supplies and food when Usopp needed help repairing the Going Merry.

evolutionMoments.description: Happa accepts Usopp's tools as payment and gives him rice balls.

reveals.information: Former bandit from Pucci (the Gourmet City) who gave up that life to become a carpenter in Water 7
Kind and generous, willing to help those in need even when they cannot pay full price
